**Jeremy Allen White** (born February 17, 1991) is an American actor. He is best known for his long-running role as Phillip "Lip" Ronan Gallagher on the [Showtime](Showtime (TV channel)) [dramedy](dramedy) series *[Shameless](Shameless (American TV series))* (2011–2021). He has also appeared in the first season of the thriller series [*Homecoming*](Homecoming (TV series)) (2018) and in several films including *[Afterschool](Afterschool)*, *[Twelve](Twelve (2010 film))*, *[Everything](After)(After Everything)*, and *[Rental](The)(The Rental)*. Since 2022, he has starred in the [Hulu](Hulu) drama series *[Bear](The)(The Bear (TV series))*, for which he received critical acclaim and won a [Choice Television Award](Critics')(Critics' Choice Television Awards), a [Globe Award](Golden)(Golden Globe Awards), and a [Actors Guild Award](Screen)(Screen Actors Guild Awards).

## Early life

Prior to meeting each other, White's parents had both moved to New York City to pursue careers in acting. His mother Eloise is from [Carolina](North)(North Carolina) and has a BFA from [Commonwealth University](Virginia)(Virginia Commonwealth University). After meeting, performing on stage together for several years, and marrying, the couple ended their acting careers and obtained jobs that would help them support their new family.

White grew up in [Gardens, Brooklyn](Carroll)(Carroll Gardens, Brooklyn).

Throughout elementary school, White was a dancer, specifically [ballet](ballet), [jazz](Jazz dance), and [tap](Tap dance). At the age of 13, upon entering a new middle school dance program, he had a change of heart and decided to pursue acting. For high school, he went to the [ Professional Performing Arts School.](Professional Performing Arts School) White got the job playing Phillip "Lip" Gallagher on *[Shameless](Shameless (American TV series))* right out of high school.

## Personal life

White married actress [Timlin](Addison)(Addison Timlin) on October 18, 2019. They have two daughters together, born in October 2018 and December 2020. In May 2023, Timlin filed for divorce.
